availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Sarah E. McGuire. Father of William E. McGuire, Theodore S. McGuire, Mary E. McGuire, and Ana L. McGuire. Owned eleven enslaved persons in 1860. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Lovelaceville District, p. 145.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Lovelaceville District, p. 18.
